metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4707 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IPython before 3.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving JSON error messages and the /api/notebooks path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-4707` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython3 - 2.4.1-1
python3-ipython - 2.4.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> It isn't clear if iPython versions less than 2.0 are affected debian> Problematic code introduced in rel-2.0.0

criterions.comment: ipython package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-1').
